alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; Garfield; McCone; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Petroleum; Prairie; Richland; Sheridan; Southwest Phillips; Western Roosevelt; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 2:21PM MST until December 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, areas of blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Montana. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon MST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas blowing snow are expected to significantly reduce visibility down to one mile at times. Large drifts of snow can be expected in some places.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
